products.title: Samsung Customisable Bezel Frame for 2023 32" The Frame TV (White)
products.body_html:
The Frame’s interchangeable frame is the secret to interior harmony. It magnetically attaches to the standard charcoal metal frame, allowing The Frame to beautifully complement any space.

Key Features

Quick and easy installation - Get a new look, fast
It's effortless to refresh The Frame's appearance, with customisable frames that adhere with magnets. Snap on the frame of your choice to update the view.

Simple and harmonious design
Each customisable frame fits The Frame seamlessly, accentuating its sleek, clean lines and crisp angles. Just pick the finish that best suits your style.

Style The Frame for any room and any space
Mix and match with a Customisable Frame of your choice, so The Frame fits perfectly into your personal space.

products.title: Philips PicoPix MaxTV Portable Projector with Android TV
products.body_html:
The PicoPix Max TV is a handy little nugget you’ll wonder how you ever did without. This superlative portable projector meets all expectations. With Android TV, your projector is the key to entering a full interactive entertainment universe. Thanks to the super bright 4 channel LEDs, you can project an image up to 120” in Full HD 1080p! If you don’t have time to finish your episode or find yourself on the move, the good news is that you can rely on a battery that lasts for up to 4 hours. With its auto focus, 4 corner correction, digital zoom and auto-keystone, you can enjoy a pixel perfect, crystal clear video wherever you're projecting. Always mobile? Thanks to its light sensor, the PicoPix Max TV automatically adjusts the brightness according to the available ambient light. The USB Type-C ports deliver fast data, audio, video and quick charging! You can connect your laptops, smartphones or tablets and simply enjoy. Thanks to Google Cast, go big and wirelessly cast your screen directly from any Android, iOS, Windows or MacOS device! Rated to last 30,000 hours, the PicoPix Max TV light source will display amazing, vivid graphics for years to come. PicoPix Max TV comes with an incredible built-in 2x12 watts stereo speakers for a truly immersive cinematic experience with a strong, precise sound. You can even use it as a Bluetooth speaker to listen your favourite tunes even if the projector is off!

True Full HD 1080p resolution
Native 1080p Full HD resolution from such a compact product means you no longer have to choose between a portable projector and high resolution. With the PicoPix MaxTV, you can watch all your favourite movies, TV shows or play games on a massive 120” with best-in-class resolution. The completely re-designed cooling system and 4 LED channels deliver incredible brightness that's 15% superior to Max, dramatically improving the contrast and avoiding washed out images.

Mind-blowing sound
Immerse yourself with ultra powerful sound, surround and bass boost. The sound is professionally tuned by a golden ear for a well balanced and perfect music or cinema playback. You can also use it as an external Bluetooth speaker via the dedicated Bluetooth button. Additionally, you get an astounding audio-visual experience and incredible sound quality right out of the box thanks to the built-in DSP.

Xtreme Portability
An ultra-compact PicoPix Max TV projector packed with everything you need. Make the most of a 4-hour battery in projection mode or 10 hours in Bluetooth Speaker mode. The Powerbank function will also charge all your devices via the USB-C or USB-A port.

Supercharged Image
Place the projector wherever you wish! Auto keystone and 4 corner correction help to eliminate crooked and distorted images for a perfectly proportioned picture even if the device is not straight in front of the wall. It also gives users an optimal image from virtually any angle and eliminates many of the hassles of an optimal set-up. Big space, small wall? No worries! The digital zoom can maximize the image size even if your projector is far away from the wall. Thanks to the 1.2 throw ratio, small spaces get a bigger picture. Max TV requires as little as 3.2m to project stunning 120” pictures.

Smart Autofocus
One-click auto-focus eliminates the hassle and burden of a manual set-up. The high-resolution camera and AI driven autofocus, will always ensure you get the clearest image, automatically.

Automatic Brightness
With the Auto Brightness feature, you won’t even need to adjust the projector if the room becomes brighter or darker! The light sensor analyses the room light in real time and automatically tunes the brightness of the PicoPix Max TV.

Texas Instrument Cinema DLP
Texas Instrument cinema technology delivers vivid pictures, deep contrast and a bright image in any conditions. You can expect an unrivalled visual experience with vibrant colours that deliver 100% of the REC709 signal.

Built-in Android TV
Your Philips Android TV Projector gives you the content you want—when you want it. You can customise the home screen to display your favourite apps, making it effortless to start streaming the movies and shows you love or pick up where you left off. Powered by the fastest AMLOGIC CPU, the PicpIx Max TV provides a smooth, best in class Android TV experience.

OK Google Ready
Want to play a game, watch Netflix or find content and apps in the Google Play store? Just tell your projector. You can even command all Google Assistant-compatible smart home devices, for example, dimming the lights and setting the thermostat on movie night.

ChromeCast Built-in
Chromecast built-in is a technology that allows you to stream your favourite entertainment and apps from your phone, tablet, or laptop right to your TV or speakers. Your phone acts as a simple, powerful remote. Just open the mobile apps you already know and love to quickly access your TV shows and playlists. No new log-ins or downloads required. You can use your phone to search, browse, queue and control the projector from anywhere in the home, and keep using it without disrupting what’s playing or draining your battery.

Fully Connected
Connect all your favourite devices via HDMI (like smartphone, tablet, laptop, gaming console) or USB-C Video and play all your videos, pictures and audio files from USB thanks to the built-in multimedia player. The Wi-fi MIMO Dual Band technology reduces buffering and is ideal for online gaming or watching Full HD movies.

Lens Protection
The lens cover ensures a complete protection of the lens during transportation.

Key Features

120" in True FULL HD 1080p

Xtreme sound and portability

Android TV experience

Bluetooth boombox function

Up to 4hrs Battery Life

Micro-USB chargeable 5V 2A

products.title: Blaupunkt 24" Portable Rechargeable TV (White)
products.body_html:
Enjoy entertainment on the go with this 24" Portable Smart TV, perfect for any setting. Featuring a built-in rechargeable battery, this TV provides up to 3 hours of use on a single charge, so you can watch your favourite shows and movies wherever you are. Powered by Google TV, it includes access to an app store with thousands of apps, Google Assistant for hands-free control, and Google Cast for easy streaming from your mobile device. With Full HD resolution, this portable TV ensures a high-quality viewing experience anytime, anywhere.


Key Features

Portable TV with built-in rechargeable battery

Google TV

Google Assist

Google Cast

App Store to download thousands of apps

Full HD Resolution

Up to 3 Hours Use time on a Single Charge

keyFeatures: Portable TV with built-in rechargeable battery (Up to 3 hours use)
Google TV with Hey Google & Google Cast
Full HD resolution

products.body_html:
True 4K Technology
Image quality with stunning clarity and crisply defined details. NOT Double HD or 2K. better image resolution and quality

2200 ANSI Lumens
Brightness that fit different light conditions scenarios and times of day. Expand the usage of projection to more than movies.

AK & AF Technology
Incredible power under the hood. Superb processing speed to adjust to different projection set-ups. Flexible to fit any room without interrupting the existing furniture and design of the user's home.

One well designed All in 1 Box
Eliminates fear. Understated simplicity. Transportable. Fits comfortably on any space without the need for complicated set-ups. Beautiful Design that matches user home decoration expectations.

Android TV
Radical ease of learning and ease of use. No strange settings. Sync across devices: Mobile, Desk, Streaming services. Works the way you do.

Dual 8W 45mm diameter full-range speaker
Endlessly vibrant, accurate, beautiful sound, culminating in a superb audio-visual experience. Used alone as a set of high-quality Bluetooth speakers.

Key Features

4K UHD DLP Home Theatre Projector

2200 ANSI Lumens and up to 30,000 hours of lamp life

Smart tech powered by Android TV 10.0

Sound by Harman Kardon

Auto Keystone Screen Adaption

WARNING: This product contains a button/coin battery and is hazardous. Keep batteries away from children. Batteries can cause severe or fatal injuries in 2 hours or less if swallowed or placed inside any part of the body. Medical attention should be sought immediately if it is suspected the battery has been swallowed or placed inside any part of the body.

products.title: LG CineBeam HU915QE 4K UHD Laser Ultra Short Throw Projector
products.body_html:
Your Own Cinema from Inches Away
The LG CineBeam HU915QE Projector is our ultimate in premium short-throw projector, offering radiant brightness at 3,700 ANSI lumens,1 plus an ultra-short 0.19 throw ratio. Just inches from the wall, this projector produces dazzling colour and contrast at epic proportions.

Bright Enough for Daytime Views
Experience luminosity like never before with 3,700 ANSI Lumens. Immerse yourself in vivid, crisp HDR imagery with vibrant colour, regardless of ambient lighting.1

Picture Quality
Real 4K has a resolution of 3840 x 2160–4x greater than FHD for incredible detail that brings movies, shows, and games to life.

Short Throw, Epic Views
Make any space your ultimate home theatre. A 0.19 Ultra-Short Throw Ratio makes it easy to transform even the smallest room into a cinema. Place your projector just 2.2" from the wall for a 90" screen, 3.9" away for a 100" screen, or 7.2" away for a breathtaking 120" viewing space.

Vivid Brilliance, Dark or Light
You’re in control of your views: Adjust IRIS Mode based on ambient lighting conditions. Select Dark Room or Bright Room for dazzling picture quality no matter when or where you watch.

Designed to Blend In
This Stylish Design features a crisp white body with a premium grey fabric accent that blends into your space.

Access Your Favourite Content
Netflix, YouTube, Apple TV+, and more are available and easy to access on webOS 6.0.2

Rich, Realistic Audio
Hear the action from all sides to feel like you’re in a true theatre. 2.2 Ch 40W Sound with four 10W speakers creates a surround-sound experience for total immersion, no extra speakers required.

Just Plug and Play
Create the ultimate home theatre setup with Expanded Ports, including multiple HDMI and USB ports plus a LAN port and more. Enjoy easy connectivity of your sound bar, gaming consoles, laptop, and beyond.

Key Features

3 Channel Laser Smart Ultra short throw projector up to 120" Screen Size

8.3 Mega pixels utilizing 4K UHD Resolution

Up to 3,700 ANSI Lumens

Light source life up to 30,000 hours

Contrast ratio (Full On/Full Off), 2,000,000:1

Apple AirPlay 2 & HomeKit

4 / 9 / 15 Point parping

webOS 6.0 (Smart)

1 Based on Brightest mode and may vary depending on your environment.
2 Internet connection and subscription to streaming services are required.
